response.original_title: Les Rameaux de feu - Mohamed Ifticène
response.overview: In a village in the mountain, Idir kills his childhood friend Akli after the latter humiliates Idir's adopted brother publicly. In hiding, Idir meets Messaoud who seeks to heal him by introducing him to a wise man.
response.title: Les Rameaux de feu - Mohamed Ifticène
